title: HashAltcoin
author: HashAltcoin
content: Product Specification•   Crypto Algorithm：ScryptThis machine has two built-in working modes:1.   The classic mode:•   Hashrate: 4300MH/s ±3%•   Power: 3450W±10%2.   The optimal power consumption mode:•   Hashrate:3200Mh/s ±3%•   Power:1920W±10%Power Supply•   Power supply AC Input voltage：200~240V•   Power supply AC Input Frequency Range：47~63Hz•   Power supply AC Input current： 20AHardware Configuration •   Networking connection mode： RJ45 Ethernet 10/100M•   Miner Size (Length*Width*Height, w/o package): 355*280*285mm (may be optimized)•   Miner Size (Length*Width*Height, with package): 570*316*430mm•   Net weight: 13.55kg•   Gross weight: 15.05kgEnvironment Requirements    •   Operation temperature:    0~40°C •   Storage temperature: -20~70°C •   Operation humidity(non-condensing) :    10~90%RHWarranty•   A 180-day warranty is provided starting from the shipping date.More info: hashaltcoin.com
